Description: Cache server error notification delivery mechanism.
Controls how often (in minutes) cache server error alerts are sent to the site administrator.
Determines how long (in minutes) should elapse prior to displaying a site level cache failure warning (a setting of 0 will always hide this warning).
Determines how long (in minutes) should elapse prior to displaying a site level alert failure warning (a setting of 0 will always hide this warning).
Determines how long (in minutes) should elapse prior to displaying a site level status history failure warning (a setting of 0 will always hide this warning).
Determines how long (in days) KPI alert history is stored.

Determines how long (in days) cache service metrics should be stored (a setting of 'Forever' will keep all history, a setting of 'None Stored' will keep no history). Please note that a large number or Forever will cause the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.

Determines how long (in days) remote context service(s) metrics should be stored (a setting of 'Forever' will keep all history, a setting of 'None Stored' will keep no history). Please note that a large number or Forever will cause the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.

Determines how long (in days) alert service metrics should be stored (a setting of 'Forever' will keep all history, a setting of 'None Stored' will keep no history). Please note that a large number or Forever will cause the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.

Determines how long (in days) status history service metrics should be stored (a setting of 'Forever' will keep all history, a setting of 'None Stored' will keep no history). Please note that a large number or Forever will cause the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.

Determines how long (in days) performance monitor metrics should be stored (a setting of 'Forever' will keep all history, a setting of 'None Stored' will keep no history). Please note that a large number or Forever will cause the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.
